type.name: org.gradle.tooling.CancellationToken
type.description:
* Token that propagates notification that an operation should be cancelled. See {@link org.gradle.tooling.CancellationTokenSource} for details. * *

All implementations of this interface are required to be thread safe.

* * @since 2.1

method.name: isCancellationRequested
method.description: * Gets whether cancellation has been requested for this token. * @return Cancellation status.

property.name: cancellationRequested
property.description: * Gets whether cancellation has been requested for this token. * @return Cancellation status.
